sentence: In a study of analyst recommendations at the major brokerages, for the underlying components of the S&P 500, Salesforce.com Inc (Symbol: CRM) has taken over the #9 spot from Broadcom Inc (Symbol: AVGO), according to ETF Channel .

Below is a chart of Salesforce.com Inc versus Broadcom Inc plotting their respective rank within the S&P 500 over time (CRM plotted in blue; AVGO plotted in green):

Below is a three month price history chart comparing the stock performance of CRM vs. AVGO:

CRM is currently trading up about 1.1%, while AVGO is up about 0.6% midday Tuesday.
